2.deployment_notes: The article is vague about application or specific deployment, but says motes were used.

3.deployment_notes: Only single sensor and basestation at the moment, but demonstrated in real (outdoor) environment, so TRL-6, but could be lower...

5.deployment_notes: Primary field is communcations, because the goal is to deploy a mesh network for all puropses, not just robotics/transport network.

6.deployment_notes: RFID tags also can be interpreted as wsn nodes

8.deployment_notes: Mobile base station shown in picture, but not mentioned in text

9.deployment_notes: 1/4 deployment - Measuring power consumption in smart university building using smart plugs and sink PC nodes, also switching off unused equipment.

10.deployment_notes: Even though temperature/moisture is envrionmental, they monitor specifically near infrastructure (panels) thus field is infrastructure

11.deployment_notes: Not a real network, but falls in our category of two+ devices in field

16.deployment_notes: Subject is a network. Localization algorithm

23.deployment_notes: Text a bit weird, might be simulation, but not sure

47.deployment_notes: Could also be friendly tracking - if both fit, then opposing  is more inclusive I think

48.deployment_notes: Field could be research, but the goal is specifically for in fligt communcation, so Transport. Also Plane can be bigger than a room, so a building scale set.

150.deployment_notes: 1/3 deployment - Tested with the FlockLab testbed. High-resolution power measurement, profiling and precise time synchronization on 30 nodes.

209.deployment_notes: 1/3 deployment - A  field  module  was  implemented,  in  a  stand-alone  mode,  in  order  to  measure  the  individual  environmental  variables  and  calculate  the  ETo,  the  obtained  data  was  stored  in  a  flash  memory  (MicroSD) every 5 minutes during 30 days.

311.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - Testing data driven link quality prediction in Motelab testbed

356.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - Comparing their method vs ZigBee.

402.deployment_notes: No specific deployment info, only that it happened

404.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - Testing underwater sensor network for underwater networking

798.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - in a simple open space.

802.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - in a lab setting. UWB providing better link reliability than WirelessHART.

926.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment - Bulding a small scale water supply testbed and testing monitoring wsn on it

1788.deployment_notes: NB! Not clear whether this is a suitable publication for our study

1982.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment WSN for shake detection deployed

2137.deployment_notes: 1/3 deployment - this one for general connectivity.

2140.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment Testing mote localization by transmission power both outdoors

2178.deployment_notes: this is actually a presentation abstract, yet as it is rather complete and a couple of pages long, I suggest that we should include it in our study

2980.deployment_notes: 1/2 deployment. 9 nodes measuring olive tree conditions

2981.deployment_notes: Weird references, deployment description not particularly specific

2987.deployment_notes: There's not only simulation, but also deployment

2988.deployment_notes:
There's not only simulation, but also deployment: Thanks to the corporation of the owners of six tall buildings near Shinjuku Station, Tokyo, we could obtain the response data.
In this paper, we chose Kogakuin University building. It consists of 29 floors and the structure is Steel, partly SRC and RC. I
used 4 sensors (Input: 1F, Output: 8F, 13F, 28F).

2991.deployment_notes: There is deployment: This section evaluates the performance of LOD and compares it with B-MAC on a real test-bed, which consists of 100 TelosB sensor nodes as shown in Fig. 10.

2992.deployment_notes:
There is deployment: Our
code runs successfully on both real motes and the TinyOS
Avrora simulator.

2997.deployment_notes: There was deployment: The system has been deployed in Building 31 of King Saud University KSA.

3002.deployment_notes: There was deployment: The proposed protocol has been implemented and tested on an IoT network with the same architecture as described in Fig. 2.

3003.deployment_notes: Deployment: "measurements from real UV sensors, which consists of anintegrated nonvolatile processer [15], FeRAM and UV sensorpowered by solar cell"

3004.deployment_notes: Deployment  lab prototype: "he prototype consists of an Arduino board, wherein control and actuatorsrules are validated, connected to a Raspberry Pi device"

3005.deployment_notes: has a deployment "We have anchored our sensing platforms on top of tenpublic buses in Lausanne."

3007.deployment_notes: The jitter-compensated VHT was implemented on the WandStem WSN node

3008.deployment_notes: To ensure accuracy, multiple reference nodes are arranged on both sides of the roadway, forming a wireless network

3009.deployment_notes: Zigbee wireless communication network composed of CC2530 chips manufactured by TI Corporation is selected for the experiment to realize the communication among the nodes. A605 laboratory is selected as the experiment location, wherein the size of the experiment area is 7mx7m, 64 beacon nodes (the distance between the reference nodes is 0.8m) and 4 transmitting nodes

3010.deployment_notes: We deploy a sensor network of ZigBee TelosB nodes as our testbed.

3011.deployment_notes: a strong-motion sensor network, consisting of 26 unidirectional accelerometers and a digital recording system, was deployed on the bridge

3012.deployment_notes: Not sure if deployment - Laboratory environment, five PCs (connected with five nodes respectively) are 2.5m apart between each other

3013.deployment_notes: The communication network is constituted of three types nodes of a coordinator, a router and an end device in using the ZigBee standard

3014.deployment_notes: With up to 124 nodes deployed in the wild, this system provides us an excellent platform for validate the availability of this method. The sensor maintains the wireless communication modules CC2530 by Chipcon which is 2.4GHz IEEE 802.15.4 compliant transceiver and 3.2V supply voltage

3015.deployment_notes: "As of the writing of the paper, the hardware implementation was still a few steps away from finishing the designed project" ?

3016.deployment_notes: Described 3 deployments, but all with same goal and hardware

3018.deployment_notes: 2/4 deployment - Measuring power consumption in smart university building centrally using smart 3-phase wire clamps with wireless transmitters. Up to 3 clamps with wired connections to single wired transmitter (thus marked as hybrid)

3019.deployment_notes: 3/4 deployment - Measuring envrionmental variables (temperature, light, moisture) in smart university building centrally using ready-bought Zigbee modules.

3020.deployment_notes: 4/4 deployment - Measuring security related environmental variables (CO2 levels, human motion, smoke detectors) in smart university building centrally using ready-bought Z-Wave devices.

3021.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Used Flocklab testbed to validate wsn protocol

3022.deployment_notes: 2/3 deployment - Set Twonet nodes to run on 900MHz to verify that the proposed approach works with 900 MHz as well.

3023.deployment_notes: 3/3 deployment - Indriya testbed set to measure RAL (Radio Awake Length)

3026.deployment_notes: 2/3 deployment - Deployment in a typical apartment. Including intereference from neighbour's WIFI.

3027.deployment_notes: 3/3 deployment - in the same article. Through wall deployment.

3029.deployment_notes: 2/3 deployment - Simple on/off irrigation system that supplies water once the volumetric water content drops under a threshold.

3030.deployment_notes: 3/3 deployment - Field located at 100Km from the data server was used in order to monitor the soil moisture from the crop roots and control the irrigation remotely.

3031.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - validation on a demo bridge in lab

3032.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Testing data driven link quality prediction in outside testbed

3033.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Observation of Kano river water level changes using a WSN.

3034.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Testing underwater sensor network for intruder location

3040.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - in a factgory setting. UWB providing better latency than WirelessHART but worse link reliability thus more packet loss.

3041.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Testing Lora and Sigfox performance using BentoBox hybrid wsn nodes

3046.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - in empty room being painted

3048.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment - Wired sensors used to check wireless sensor network deployment data

3049.deployment_notes: 2/3 deployment - this one for activity monitoring while sitting

3050.deployment_notes: 3/3 deployment - this one for general activity monitoring

3052.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment Testing mote localization by transmission power indoors

3059.deployment_notes: 2/2 deployment 10 nodes in a water desalination plant monitoring biofouling
